2.1.9.1.3. xml_compare.XmlCompare¶

class xml_compare.XmlCompare(xml_first, xml_second, encoding='UTF-8')¶
__init__(xml_first, xml_second, encoding='UTF-8')¶

Constructor for Xml_compare.

Parameters:
  • xml_first (string) – The XML document to use as basis for comparison.
  • xml_second (string) – The XML document to check for functional equality with the first.

Methods

__init__(xml_first, xml_second, encoding='UTF-8')

Constructor for Xml_compare.

Parameters:
  • xml_first (string) – The XML document to use as basis for comparison.
  • xml_second (string) – The XML document to check for functional equality with the first.
compare_attr()¶

Compare the attributes of two XML files. Raise CompareError if comparison fails.

Returns:None or raises CompareError.
Returns type:None | Exception
compare_text()¶

Compare the text values of two XML files. Raise CompareError if comparison fails.

Returns:None or raises CompareError.
Returns type:None | Exception
